website_summaries.verdict: No space for a countertop sterilizer? No problem. This spacious steam sterilizer sanitizes your baby items in 2 minutes and fits in most standard microwaves.
pros: Destroys up to 99.9% of common bacteria in 2 minutes
Open-away latch helps to prevent injuries from steam
Fits up to 4 bottles and 2 breast pump shields at a single time
cons: Sometimes leaks water outside of the container

customer_reviews.title: Ugh, I HATE this thing! Its trash!
customer_reviews.text: So frustrating to use! Who designed this and did they do no quality assurance tests? What is the hinge part for?! It doesnt actually hinge anything or roll, its just a nuisance! The handle part at the top isnt big enough to securely pick up the lid, why wouldnt they allow the handle to pop up so you can grab it!? You have to put your hand on the top so the steam burns you. Also the hot water easily spills out and will burn you. I HATE this thing so much! What idiot designed something that required you endlessly fidget with it when it involves hot steaming water!
customer_reviews.author: Somethingcreative

customer_reviews.title: So much easier than a pot of water
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier to use than boiling a whole pot of water. It holds a fair amount of items. I can fit two sets of pumping materials in at once. I use it mainly for that. You do have to measure out seven ounces of water pretty exactly to guarantee that the system works to sterilize the items. This isn't a big deal. Also​, a whole cycle only takes 14 minutes! Four minutes in the microwave and ten to sit. It would take me this long just to get a pot of water to boil on the stove to boil my items.
customer_reviews.author: MER1988

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room, but poor design
customer_reviews.text: Would be perfect, but the hinge on the back makes it slightly difficult to get the lid on and off. Update: took another star off since I'm finding more problems. I like that it came with a bottle brush, a special brush for the (bottle) nipples, and the tongs are a nice touch. It is pretty large though, so you'll need a full size microwave. But on the plus side it does fit full size bottles, not just the 4oz ones.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Drips and leaks
customer_reviews.text: It leaks. The condensation drips down the inside roof and walls of the lid and then drops out through the space between lid and base. Not sure why there isn't a seal there. This is one of just a handful of amazon items I returned.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: A MUST
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift, but I hve the same item in another brand. The concept is the same. My friends said they love it, and they use it 24/7. Specially th first couple of monht you are washing bottles, nipples, pump equipment and pacifiers all day. You don't have time to b waiting for the dishwasher to run all day. Hand washing leaves and after taste; my baby rejected bottles when I tried to transiton to that. Leave it running and have clean bottles 5 minutes later.
customer_reviews.author: C.R.U

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this as it made cleaning bottles a breeze. 2 minutes in the microwave and then 10 minutes to let steam, and done. In those early months you really need everything you can to make life easier, so I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mel M

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We use this everyday. My wife pumps at work. So we want to clean and sterilise as quickly as possible ready for the next day. We simply run the dishwasher then place the parts in the steam cleaner ready to dry for the next day. Only gripe is that 8oz dr brown bottles won't stand up right due to lack of height
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T. K. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: Easy and effective way to sterilize bottles. Would recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Danabubbis

customer_reviews.title: Too big to fit in a microwave
customer_reviews.text: This thing is too big to fit in a normal sized microwave. Better off just washing the bottles by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sterilizing option
customer_reviews.text: So happy I got this. I hate creating waste so I did not want to keep purchasing the bags. Also saves money since you don’t have to keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel/LaToshia Heng

customer_reviews.title: Not for me personally
customer_reviews.text: It works as a steamer I just dont feel like it sanitizing things and I think I'd feel that way with any microwave sanitizer..so if you're looking for one thing is a good price and worth trying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every new parent needs one
customer_reviews.text: I have used this as an alternative to boiling bottles ( i still do boil them all once a week) but this product helps save time and is so easy to use. I don't stick to the stacking method they suggest as you have to fit the bottle parts as you go depending on the type of bottles you use but all in all, bottles and all parts are cleaned and sterilized well. Just be careful when opening the lids after as the steam can be overwhelming. A very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepygirl7tt

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately did not fit in our microwave
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great concept for steam sterilizing breastpump parts, bottles, nipples, pacifiers etc. However, it did not fit in our microwave. The diameter was too great for the microwave door to close. The description says "Fits all standard microwaves", and I didn't think I had a smaller-than-average microwave, but I guess I do. Instead, I have been using the Medela Quick Clean Micro-Steam Bags.
customer_reviews.author: cmanning3

customer_reviews.title: We were going though the medela sanitizing bags like crazy, and those are not cheap
customer_reviews.text: This thing came in SO handy once my daughter was born. We were going though the medela sanitizing bags like crazy, and those are not cheap. This though was a life saver, and totally worth the price! Buy it and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sterilizing nebulizer equipment!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to sterilize nebulizer equipment when traveling. Holds a lot, easy to use. I would give five stars if the lid were a little less cumbersome to use. It is pretty big, I wasn't sure if it would fit into some of the microwaves at places we stayed, but usually its not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Shoveltrick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This would be the perfect baby shower gift. If you follow the manufacturers directions this product is safe and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JGR

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Love that it just takes a couple minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love that it just takes a couple minutes to sterilize my baby stuff vs what it would take to do it on the stove. I've had this for 4 months and still works good. The only thing is the two clasps that hold the lid on sometimes slip open, so I don't just hold it by the handle or sometimes my bottles will fall out. Otherwise very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Must buy especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: For $11, this is a must buy. It's quick (2min) and even holds tall bottles. If you have a wide neck Dr. Brown's 4oztles, you still have to tilt it sideways. I would wish that they made this sterilizer taller but then it wouldn't fit in my microwave or it would but I would have to hold the body and in the process would burn my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Ged

customer_reviews.title: Not a 4 minute steamer
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I thought it would sterilize bottles in 4 minutes. The directions say to microwave for 4 minutes then let sit closed for another 10. I do like it better than my electric steamer because this is so easy to clean. It holds a lot more than it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: kampy

customer_reviews.title: Money’s worth
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use. Easy to clean. No mess. Only takes 2 min. Would buy again. I have been using this everyday. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shiann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I was boiling my little girls bottles daily. So much less time and it doesn’t ruin my pot. I am very happy with this product.

product_meta.title: Munchkin Steam Guard Microwave Sterilizer
product_meta.description:
You don't want harsh chemicals anywhere near your baby and his feeding supplies, but you don't have the counter space for a traditional bottle sterilizer, either, so how can you ensure everything is squeaky clean? The Munchkin Steam Guard Microwave Sterilizer is a safe, natural and efficient way to kill up 99.9% of bacteria on bottles, nipples, pacifiers, teethers, small toys and breast pump accessories right in the microwave. There's enough room to sterilize up to 4 baby bottles and 2 breast pump shields at once. This compact baby sterilizer fits all standard microwaves and works with both regular and wide-mouth bottles. The locking tab is designed to safeguard everything inside and prevent accidental opening, too. Baby-safe cleaning should always come this naturally.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Steam Guard Microwave Sterilizer helps prevent steam burns with heat resistant handle and tongs. It is compact and lightweight. This has a one tab latch to open lid and fits all standard microwaves.
feature_bullets: Kills up to 99.9% of common bacteria in as little as 2 minutes
Lightweight, compact bottle sterilizer with heat-resistant handles
Holds up to 4 bottles and 2 breast pump shields at once
Works in all standard microwaves. Product dimensions: 12.5 x 11.3 x 6.7 inches
